meanings.sent1: The forest was full of unexplored paths waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent2: The map showed many unexplored areas that had not been explored yet.
meanings.sent3: The detective's unexplored theory turned out to be the key to solving the case.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was an unexplored territory, filled with hidden thoughts and ideas.
meanings.sent5: The unexplored cave held secrets that no one had ever uncovered before.

meanings.definition: Not yet traveled through or visited
meanings.sent1: The unexplored island was rumored to be home to rare plants and animals.
meanings.sent2: The adventurers set out to explore the unexplored lands beyond the mountains.
meanings.sent3: The unexplored beach seemed to beckon to the curious children playing nearby.
meanings.sent4: His unexplored dreams stretched out before him like an endless road of possibilities.
meanings.sent5: The unexplored galaxy held mysteries that no one had ever dared to uncover.
